WRITING.TITLE: TIL The droid BB-8 from the new Star Wars film was imagined by XKCD years ago

WRITING.TEXT: He's saying commentators should avoid hyperbole because cricket isn't that important.

WRITING.TITLE: "The Titanic was a tragedy, the Ethiopian drought a disaster, and neither bears any relation to a dropped catch." Benaud's advice for commentary.
